files.name: main.py
files.content:
while( True  ):

      Number = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit):"))
      
      if (Number == 0):
            print ("Done.")
            break
          
      elif (Number < 0):  
            print("Error: Must be greater than 0")

      else:
       
            initialNumber = Number
          
            accumulator = Number
            counter = Number  
          
            while ( counter >= 1 ):
          
                print (accumulator, "x", (counter - 1 ))
                accumulator = (accumulator * (counter - 1))
                
                counter = (counter - 1)
            
                if( counter ==  1): break
          
            print ( initialNumber, "factorial is", accumulator)


      print("")
